text: arasesata yetiya raachulasakala (te'omlokara sampradayara imanara paraa) niraasa haâ€™la arau manuhe dharana karaile ye, raachulasakalaka micha pratisrauti diya haiche, tetiya te'omlokara ocarata amara sahayya ahi pale. E'idarae ami yaka iccha karao si najata paya. Kintu aparaadhi sampradayara paraa amara sasti pratiraodha karaa nahaya
